item.title: Will Apple’s Wearables Success Accelerate AR?
item.description: Meanwhile, the story is the opposite for wearables, as that division is on its way up. It exceeded $10 billion in quarterly revenue for the first time, up $3.7 billion year-over-year. This falls short of the iPhone’s $4 billion year-over-year jump but is a greater percentage jump from a lower base.
